name: Anima Visage
description: The wearer regenerates a percentage of their maximum Health each second.

name: Death's Defiance
description: A percentage of the damage the wearer receives is instead dealt over time as non-lethal damage.

name: Eternal Winter
description: Enemies who damage the wearer have their Attack Speed slowed for several seconds. After being slowed this way a certain number of times, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every several seconds.

name: Manazane
description: After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore Mana over several seconds.

name: Obsidian Cleaver
description: The wearer's attacks and spell damage shred enemy Armor and Magic Resistance by 40% for several seconds.

name: Randuin's Sanctum
description: At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the rest of combat.

name: Rocket-Propelled Fist
description: At the start of combat, the wearer pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, stunning them for several seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy.

name: Gold Collector
description: The wearer executes enemies below a percentage of health on hit. Executions generate 1 gold.

name: Zhonya's Paradox
description: The first instance of damage that would reduce the wearer below a percentage of their Health is prevented, causing them to become invulnerable for several seconds.
